title: Touch of Surrender
description:
Surrender can be the sweetest sin…
When Lycan Kierland Scott and Morgan Cantrell are forced to work together for the first time in over a decade in order to save Kierland’s brother, the two Watchmen find themselves embarking on a dangerous journey through a land where one wrong move could lead to disaster. To survive, the longtime enemies must somehow find a way to set aside their past grievances and face their emotional demons head-on, even as the primal hungers they’ve worked so hard to deny wreak havoc on their sanity...and their hearts.* * * * * *(Re-released in a 2nd Edition)
author: Rhyannon Byrd
